ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Type
ConfigItem.Description: Allows defining new types for ticket (if ticket type feature is enabled), e.g. incident, problem, change, ...

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeKey13
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the the free key field number 13 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText13
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free text field number 13 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

Hash.Item: DO NOT ACTIVATE TicketFreeText13. GENERAL CATALOG IS USED.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeKey14
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the the free key field number 14 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText14
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free text field number 14 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

Hash.Item: DO NOT ACTIVATE TicketFreeText14. GENERAL CATALOG IS USED.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText14::DefaultSelection
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default selection of the free text field number 14 for tickets (if more than one option is provided).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeKey15
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the the free key field number 15 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText15
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free text field number 15 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText15::DefaultSelection
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default selection of the free text field number 15 for tickets (if more than one option is provided).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeKey16
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the the free key field number 16 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText16
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free text field number 16 for tickets to add a new ticket attribute.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeText16::DefaultSelection
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default selection of the free text field number 16 for tickets (if more than one option is provided).

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimeKey3
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free time key field number 3 for tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimePeriod3
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the years (in future and in past) which can get selected in free time field number 3.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimeKey4
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free time key field number 4 for tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimePeriod4
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the years (in future and in past) which can get selected in free time field number 4.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimeKey5
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free time key field number 5 for tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimePeriod5
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the years (in future and in past) which can get selected in free time field number 5.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimeKey6
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the free time key field number 6 for tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimeDiff6
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the difference from now (in seconds) of the free time field number 6's default value.

ConfigItem.Name: TicketFreeTimePeriod6
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the years (in future and in past) which can get selected in free time field number 6.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketFreeText
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketClose###TicketFreeText
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free text options shown in the close ticket screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###TicketFreeText
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free text options shown in the ticket compose screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmail###TicketFreeTime
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free time options shown in the email ticket screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###TicketFreeTime
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free time options shown in the phone ticket screen of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPriority###TicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket type in the ticket priority screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPriority###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the service in the ticket priority screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketSearch###TicketFreeText
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free text options shown in the ticket search of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketSearch###TicketFreeTime
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket free time options shown in the ticket search of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###310-FreeText
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a free text field in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.
